title: A prognostication made for the yeere of our Lord God M.D.LXXXII.      Conteyning meete matter for such a worke: gathered out of learned authors, and set downe to profite such as lacke the knowledge thereof. by Thomas Buckmaster
author: Buckminster, Thomas, ca. 1531-1599?
